saf.core.ui

Interface ISAFDisplay

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSAFDisplay

    public interface ISAFDisplay
    Encapsulates the main components of the SAF main application window.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $ $Date: 2005/11/21 18:55:17 $
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display()
      Displays the main application window.
      javax.swing.JFrame getFrame()
      Gets the JFrame of the main application window.
      void init(IWindowCustomizer customizer, GUIBarManager manager)
      Initializes the display based on info in the customizer and using the menu, tool and status bars from the gui bar manager.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrame

        javax.swing.JFrame getFrame()
        Gets the JFrame of the main application window.
        Returns:
        the JFrame of the main application window.

      • display

        void display()
        Displays the main application window.

      • init

        void init(IWindowCustomizer customizer,
        GUIBarManager manager)
        Initializes the display based on info in the customizer and using the menu, tool and status bars from the gui bar manager.
        Parameters:
        customizer - contains main frame size, position etc. info
        manager - the bar manager containing the menu, etc. bars
